name: Efficiency and Sustainable Energy (EASE) Home Program
description: BayREN covers 80% of cost for home efficiency measures (insulation, duct sealing); your share not to exceed $1,000; includes help with other rebates and fixed pricing with vetted contractors
fullDescription: BayREN's EASE Home Program covers 80% of home efficiency upgrade costs for income-qualified Bay Area homeowners, with a capped out-of-pocket maximum and vetted contractors.
whatTheyOffer:
- 80% of upgrade costs covered by BayREN
- Your share capped at $1,000 maximum
- Insulation upgrades
- Duct sealing and HVAC improvements
- Help applying for additional rebates
- Fixed pricing with pre-vetted contractors
- No surprise costs
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility (varies by household size)
2. Apply through BayREN website
3. Schedule free home energy assessment
4. Review recommended improvements and costs
5. BayREN handles rebate applications
6. Pay your capped share (max $1,000)
keywords: BayREN, EASE, 80%, insulation, duct sealing, low-income, $1000 cap, home upgrade, energy efficiency
